Title: Relates to the removal of a special district officer by recall
Summary: Relates to the removal of a special district officer by recall; requires the state board of elections to prepare a sample form of a recall petition; establishes requirements for the filing and approval of recall petitions.
LawCode: Add ยง36-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the removal of a special district officer by recall
